quest.text:
In Python, outputting text to the screen involves having to type the keyword print followed by a space and the desired output surrounded by quotation marks! (")
print "Hello"
will have the text "My name is Richard" show up on screen. Try outputting the word Hello to the screen. Press the execute button when you're ready to check your answer!

Write the following in to the left:
print "Hello"
And press the execute button!

Congratulations! You helped Richard with his problem!
Printing will be used throughout this game for testing answers.
